content: "www.usatoday.com/news/world/2009-04-26-italy-pirates_N.htm" Somali Pirates fired on this cruise ship but got quite a surprise. Now read this same story on CNN. Boy talk about a liberal newspaper. Anyway I wonder why we can't take action on the high seas like the Italians?

content: All ships have fire hoses and most crews are trained fire fighters, that training might exceed military expertise. Use of fire hoses was recommended against pirates in the Straits of Malacca back in the 60's. While fire hoses might drown a small boat, fire hose range is well within small arms and RPG range, they could cause caualties. Doing that sort of thing when a liner full of passengers is involved could be dicey. Lucky Italians
